name: Emojinal Van Hearts
description:
A 2 Player social guessing game in which you drive your van through the musical track in order to repair your relationship!. Players must predict each other's reactions to emojis to progress through the track and ramp up the music! Enhance your friendship enough, and you win! This game was made during the global game jam 2020. 

Player 1 - Use WAD for driving the van.

Player 2 - Use arrow keys left up and right to secretly choose your emoji response.
